name: Accountants World UK
overview:
AccountantsWorld, The Social Network for Accountants.

The network is devoted solely to Accountants and aims to cater for all their Social Media Networking needs.

The network is open to both Accountants in Corporate Industries and Practices and to all those within the finance sector including students.

Accountants can create, join and promote Groups and Firms and can post their Articles to share with the whole world.

They can host and promote their Events and start discussions in the Forums alongside Live Chatrooms.

Accountants can post vacant positions on the Job Board therefore eliminating the intricacies of recruitment.
